column4: Hi i'm in an operating systems class, and I have to install kernel version 2.6.31 with no patches. (we are playing aroudn with some exploits). Is there a version of ubuntu that ships with this?
you're in OS class.  you're learning about exploits.  the least you could do is figure out how to install ubuntu (or another linux) in vm image.  hint: go download vmplayer
go grab the source, unpack, "make menuconfig", "make bzImage"
